plot: Video Stop is a coming-of-age comedy about the life of R.J. MacReady, a young man working a dead-end job at a local video store. Colorful co-workers and customers revolve through Video Stop...
title: Video Stop
plot_es: Video Stop is a coming-of-age comedy about the life of R.J. MacReady, a young man working a dead-end job at a local video store. Colorful co-workers and customers revolve through Video Stop...
